name: webex
description: Webex is a Cisco-powered video conferencing and collaboration platform offering online meetings, webinars, screen sharing, and team messaging

tools.name: WEBEX_CREATE_ROOM
tools.description: Tool to create a new room. Use when you need to spin up a dedicated space for team collaboration or topic discussion.

inputSchema.title: CreateRoomRequest

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: The team ID to associate the room with. Optional.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a Webex room.

tools.name: WEBEX_CREATE_TEAM
tools.description: Tool to create a new team. Use when you need to group rooms under a shared team.

inputSchema.title: CreateTeamRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a Webex team.

tools.name: WEBEX_GET_TEAM_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific team by teamId. Use when you need full metadata of a team before performing team-related operations.

inputSchema.title: MessagingGetTeamDetailsRequest

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: The unique identifier for the team.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a Webex team.

tools.name: WEBEX_LIST_TEAMS
tools.description: Tool to list teams. Use when you need to retrieve the teams the authenticated user is a member of.

inputSchema.title: MessagingListTeamsRequest

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum number of teams to return.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which teams to list.

tools.name: WEBEX_LIST_WEBHOOKS
tools.description: Tool to list webhooks. Use after authentication to retrieve webhooks filtered by max or ownership.

inputSchema.title: ListWebhooksRequest

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum number of webhooks to return

ownedBy.title: Owned By
ownedBy.description: Filter webhooks by ownership: 'creator' for user-owned, 'org' for org-wide

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which webhooks to list.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_CREATE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Tool to post a message to a Webex room or person. Use when you have a target roomId or private recipient and want to send text, markdown, files, or card attachments.

inputSchema.title: MessagingCreateMessageRequest

files.title: Files
files.description: Public URLs of files to post. Only one URL allowed per message.

roomId.title: Room Id
roomId.description: The room ID to post the message in. Required if sending to a room.

markdown.title: Markdown
markdown.description: Markdown-formatted message. Overrides text if present.

toPersonId.title: To Person Id
toPersonId.description: The person ID for sending a private 1:1 message. Mutually exclusive with roomId.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Content attachments (cards). Only one attachment per message is supported.

toPersonEmail.title: To Person Email
toPersonEmail.description: The email address of the person for a private 1:1 message. Mutually exclusive with roomId.

inputSchema.description:
Request parameters for posting a message to a Webex room or person.
Note: One of roomId, toPersonId, or toPersonEmail is required.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_CREATE_ROOM
tools.description: Tool to create a new room. Use to create a dedicated space for collaboration after authentication.

inputSchema.title: MessagingCreateRoomRequest

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: Optional team ID to associate with the room.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a Webex room.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_CREATE_TEAM_MEMBERSHIP
tools.description: Tool to add a person to a Webex team by personId or personEmail. Use when granting a user access to a team; requires teamId and one of personId or personEmail.

inputSchema.title: MessagingCreateTeamMembershipRequest

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: The team ID to add the person to.

personId.title: Person Id
personId.description: The person ID to add. Required if personEmail is not provided.

isModerator.title: Is Moderator
isModerator.description: Set to true to make the person a team moderator.

personEmail.title: Person Email
personEmail.description: The email address of the person to add. Required if personId is not provided.

inputSchema.description:
Request schema for adding a person to a Webex team by personId or personEmail.
One of personId or personEmail is required.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_DELETE_MEMBERSHIP
tools.description: Tool to delete a Webex membership by its unique identifier. Use when you need to remove a member from a space after confirming the membership exists. Example: "Delete the membership with ID Y2lzY29zcGFjMDczNzA2Njg0ZDliY2YxNDE4NDQyYzQ5NDQzOTExYTk4".

inputSchema.title: MessagingDeleteMembershipRequest

membershipId.title: Membership Id
membershipId.description: Unique identifier for the membership to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `MessagingDeleteMembership`.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_DELETE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Tool to delete a Webex message by its unique identifier. Use after confirming the messageId to remove unintended or obsolete messages. Example: "Delete the message with ID Y2lzY29zcGFyazovL21lc3NhZ2UvYWJjMTIzNDU2Nzg5".

inputSchema.title: MessagingDeleteMessageRequest

messageId.title: Message Id
messageId.description: Unique identifier for the message to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `MessagingDeleteMessage`.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_DELETE_ROOM
tools.description: Tool to delete a Webex room by its ID. Use after confirming the roomId when you need to permanently remove or archive a space. Example: "Delete the room with ID Y2lzY29..."

inputSchema.title: MessagingDeleteRoomRequest

roomId.title: Room Id
roomId.description: Unique identifier for the room to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `MessagingDeleteRoom`.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_GET_MEMBERSHIP_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific membership. Use when you need metadata for a membership by its ID.

inputSchema.title: MessagingGetMembershipDetailsRequest

membershipId.title: Membership Id
membershipId.description: The unique identifier for the membership.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a Webex membership by its unique identifier.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_GET_MESSAGE_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific message. Use when you need full content and metadata by message ID.

inputSchema.title: MessagingGetMessageDetailsRequest

messageId.title: Message Id
messageId.description: The unique identifier for the message.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a Webex message by its unique identifier.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_GET_ROOM_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific room. Use when you need full metadata of a specific room before posting messages or updating settings.

inputSchema.title: MessagingGetRoomDetailsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a Webex room.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_GET_TEAM_MEMBERSHIP_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific team membership. Use when you need metadata for a team membership by its ID.

inputSchema.title: MessagingGetTeamMembershipDetailsRequest

membershipId.title: Membership Id
membershipId.description: The unique identifier for the team membership.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a Webex team membership by its unique identifier.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_LIST_MEMBERSHIPS
tools.description: Tool to list memberships in a Webex room. Use when you need to retrieve or filter membership details by roomId, personId, personEmail, or teamId. Supports limiting the response size.

inputSchema.title: MessagingListMembershipsRequest

max.title: Max
max.description: Limit the maximum number of membership records returned.

roomId.title: Room Id
roomId.description: Filter memberships by the Webex room ID.

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: Filter memberships associated with a specific team ID.

personId.title: Person Id
personId.description: Filter memberships by the Webex person ID.

personEmail.title: Person Email
personEmail.description: Filter memberships by the member's email address.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which memberships to list.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_LIST_MESSAGES
tools.description: Tool to list messages in a room. Use when you need to retrieve chat history filtered by room, time window, or mentions.

inputSchema.title: MessagingListMessagesRequest

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum number of messages to return per request.

before.title: Before
before.description: Filter messages sent before a specific ISO8601 timestamp.

roomId.title: Room Id
roomId.description: Unique identifier for the room to list messages from.

parentId.title: Parent Id
parentId.description: Filter messages that are replies to a specific message ID.

beforeMessage.title: Before Message
beforeMessage.description: Filter messages sent before a specific message, by its ID.

mentionedPeople.title: Mentioned People
mentionedPeople.description: Filter messages where the caller is mentioned; use 'me' or person IDs.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which messages to list in a room.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_LIST_ROOMS
tools.description: Tool to list rooms the authenticated user belongs to. Use after authentication when needing to retrieve spaces filtered by team, type, or sorted. Example: "List my group rooms sorted by last activity."

inputSchema.title: MessagingListRoomsRequest

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum number of rooms to return.

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: Sort results by 'id', 'lastactivity' (recent activity), or 'created' (creation date).

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: Limit rooms to those associated with a specific team by ID.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which rooms to list.

tools.name: WEBEX_MESSAGING_LIST_TEAM_MEMBERSHIPS
tools.description: Tool to list team memberships. Use when you need to retrieve or filter team membership details by teamId, personId, or personEmail, with optional max limit. Use after confirming the team or person context.

inputSchema.title: MessagingListTeamMembershipsRequest

max.title: Max
max.description: Limit the maximum number of team membership records returned.

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: Filter memberships by the Webex team ID.

personId.title: Person Id
personId.description: Filter memberships by the Webex person ID.

personEmail.title: Person Email
personEmail.description: Filter memberships by the member's email address.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which team memberships to list.

tools.name: WEBEX_PEOPLE_GET_PERSON
tools.description: Tool to get details for a specific person. Use when you have a person's ID and need full profile information. Call after confirming the person's ID.

inputSchema.title: PeopleGetPersonRequest

callingData.title: Calling Data
callingData.description: If true, include the person's calling data in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a specific person by ID.

tools.name: WEBEX_PEOPLE_LIST_PEOPLE
tools.description: Tool to list people in your organization. Use when you need to retrieve people filtered by email, display name, IDs, roles, or location.

inputSchema.title: PeopleListPeopleRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: List people by ID. Accepts up to 85 person IDs separated by commas.

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum number of people to return per request.

email.title: Email
email.description: List people with this email address. For non-admin calls, either email or displayName is required.

orgId.title: Org Id
orgId.description: List people in this organization. Only admin users of another organization (such as partners) may use this parameter.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: List of role IDs separated by commas.

locationId.title: Location Id
locationId.description: List people present in this location.

callingData.title: Calling Data
callingData.description: Include Webex Calling user details in the response. Default is false.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: List people whose name starts with this string. For non-admin calls, either displayName or email is required.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to filter which people to list.

tools.name: WEBEX_ROOMS_GET_ROOM_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details for a specific room. Use when you need full metadata of a room before posting messages or updating settings.

inputSchema.title: RoomsGetRoomDetailsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a Webex room.

tools.name: WEBEX_UPDATE_MEMBERSHIP
tools.description: Tool to update a membership by membershipId. Use when modifying a member's moderator or monitor status in a Webex room.

inputSchema.title: MessagingUpdateMembershipRequest

isMonitor.title: Is Monitor
isMonitor.description: Set to true to make the user a room monitor.

isModerator.title: Is Moderator
isModerator.description: Set to true to make the user a room moderator.

membershipId.title: Membership Id
membershipId.description: Unique identifier of the membership to update.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a Webex membership's moderator or monitor status.

tools.name: WEBEX_UPDATE_ROOM
tools.description: Tool to update a room's title and settings. Use when you need to rename, lock/unlock, or reassign a Webex space.

inputSchema.title: MessagingUpdateRoomRequest

title.title: Title
title.description: New user-friendly name for the room.

roomId.title: Room Id
roomId.description: Unique identifier of the room to update.

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: Team ID to associate the room with. Use to move the room under a different team.

isLocked.title: Is Locked
isLocked.description: Lock the room to prevent new users from joining.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a Webex room's details.

tools.name: WEBEX_UPDATE_TEAM
tools.description: Tool to update a team's name by teamId. Use when you need to rename a Webex team. Example: "Change team 12345 name to 'Project X Team'".

inputSchema.title: MessagingUpdateTeamRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: New user-friendly name for the team.

teamId.title: Team Id
teamId.description: Unique identifier of the team to update.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a Webex team's details.

tools.name: WEBEX_WEBHOOKS_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to create a new webhook for events. Use when you need to register for Webex event notifications.

inputSchema.title: WebhooksCreateWebhookRequest

appId.title: App Id
appId.description: (Internal) Application ID associated with this webhook.

event.title: Event
event.description: The event type that triggers the webhook (created, updated, or deleted).

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Optional filter expression to scope notifications, e.g., 'roomId=Y2lzY29zcGFyazovL3VzL1JPT00vMTIz'.

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: Optional secret used to generate an HMAC payload signature.

ownedBy.title: Owned By
ownedBy.description: Specifies webhook ownership: 'creator' delivers only to creator, 'org' delivers organization-wide.

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: The Webex resource to monitor. One of: messages, memberships, rooms, teams, team_memberships, meetings, meetingRecordings, meetingTranscripts.

targetUrl.title: Target Url
targetUrl.description: The URL that will receive POST event notifications.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for creating a Webex webhook.

tools.name: WEBEX_WEBHOOKS_DELETE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific webhook. Use when you need to remove an existing webhook by its ID after confirming the identifier.

inputSchema.title: WebhooksDeleteWebhookRequest

webhookId.title: Webhook Id
webhookId.description: Unique identifier for the webhook to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for WebhooksDeleteWebhook.

tools.name: WEBEX_WEBHOOKS_GET_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to get details for a specific webhook. Use when you need to inspect a webhook's configuration before taking action.

inputSchema.title: WebhooksGetWebhookRequest

webhookId.title: Webhook Id
webhookId.description: The unique identifier of the webhook to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details for a specific webhook by ID.
